title: Help me please.
body: Alright, so I was playing my newly bought Nidalee and all of a sudden my mac restarts and it has like a kind of effect from the purge where it's glitchy if you know what I mean. I obviously panicked and restarted my mac. I log in and try to play another game, same thing happened. I just want to play without getting banned from a stupid crash. Help me.

replies.body:
Hmm.. it sounds like your Mac could be experiencing some hardware or localized software issues. I'd recommend working through our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac), as it will help you reset your SMC and NVRAM, which could resolve the issue.

If you still encounter issues with this *after* working through that guide, we can take a look at testing your Mac's hardware for failure.
